sentences.sContent: Reduce Stress. Stress affects all body systems, including your reproductive system.
sentences.sContent_eng: Reduce Stress. Stress affects all body systems, including your reproductive system.
sentences.sCn: 减压。压力影响所有身体器官，包括你的生殖系统。

sentences.sContent: Obstetrics and gynecology are combined in the specialty that deals with pregnancy and birth and diseases of the female reproductive system.
sentences.sContent_eng: Obstetrics and gynecology are combined in the specialty that deals with pregnancy and birth and diseases of the female reproductive system.
sentences.sCn: 产科与妇科合并成处理妊娠、生育及女性生殖系统疾病的专科。

trans.tranCn: [解剖] 生殖系统；繁殖方式
